question: How does the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) relate to the American Rescue Plan?
text:
How does the Inflation Reduction Act (IRA) relate to the American Rescue Plan? 
          
        
The IRA extends the enhancements to Affordable Care Act (ACA) premium subsidies originally created by the American Rescue Plan (ARP) which were set to expire at the end of 
2022
. Thanks to this new law, Pennsylvanians will be able to receive these enhanced subsidies through 2025.
